00035 using namespace std;
00036 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00037 
00038 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00039 
00040 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet );
00041 
00042 DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet()
00043 {
00044         data = 0;
00045         dc = 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::~DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet()
00049 {
00050 
00051 }
00052 
00053 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::setUp()
00054 {
00055         data = new GenericData;
00056         GenericFileReader reader;
00057         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00058         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00059         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00060         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00061 
00062         Fs::aptOpen(ifs, TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00063         dc = new DataGroup(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, *dchBegin, ifs, true);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::tearDown()
00067 {
00068         ifs.close();
00069         delete data;
00070         delete dc;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::CreationTest()
00074 {
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::HeaderTest()
00079 {
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc->Header().GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00081 }
00082 
00083 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::DataSetByIndexTest()
00084 {
00085         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(0);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00087 
00088         // Check the DataSet data
00089         dataPlane->Open();
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00093 
00094         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00095         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00096         {
00097                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00098                 u_int16_t value;
00099                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00101         }
00102 
00103         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00104         dataPlane->Delete();
00105 }
00106 
00107 void DataGroupTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet::DataSetByNameTest()
00108 {
00109         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(L"acquired data");
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00111 
00112         // Check the DataSet data
00113         dataPlane->Open();
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00117 
00118         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00119         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00120         {
00121                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00122                 u_int16_t value;
00123                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00124                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00125         }
00126 
00127         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00128         dataPlane->Delete();
00129 }
